# styleForOverlay(overlay, geoJSON)

**Interface Method**

Overrides the style of overlays.

## Declaration

```swift
styleForOverlay?(
        overlay: PolylineOverlay | PolygonOverlay,
        geoJSON: GeoJSONTypes.LineString | GeoJSONTypes.Polygon,
    ): Style;
```

## Parameters

- **overlay**: The overlay to style.
- **geoJSON**: The original GeoJSON for the `feature` or `geometry` object`.`

## Return Value

This method returns a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Style] object for the provided overlay.

## Discussion

MapKit JS calls this method for each overlay, and after each call to [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/GeoJSONDelegate/itemForPoint] and [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/GeoJSONDelegate/itemForPolygon].

## Overriding items

- **itemForFeature(item, geoJSON)**: Overrides a feature.
- **itemForFeatureCollection(itemCollection, geoJSON)**: Overrides a feature collection.
- **itemForLineString(overlay, geoJSON)**: Overrides a line string.
- **itemForMultiLineString(itemCollection, geoJSON)**: Overrides a multiline string.
- **itemForPoint(coordinate, geoJSON)**: Overrides a point.
- **itemForMultiPoint(itemCollection, geoJSON)**: Overrides a multipoint object.
- **itemForPolygon(overlay, geoJSON)**: Overrides a polygon.
- **itemForMultiPolygon(itemCollection, geoJSON)**: Overrides a multipolygon.
title: styleForOverlay(overlay, geoJSON)
